name: Cash Coach
description:
We are fighting against the consumerism system which pushes people to buy stuff they don't need, with money they don't have to impress people they don't like.

We are fighting against the $1000 bn toxic credit card debt that prevents people from building their wealth.

Lastly, we want to make personal finance fun for our generation!

team.title: CTO
team.name: Alexander Priezzhev
team.bioHtml: Coding since 1992. Got master degree in computer sciences in 2002, MBA in 2013. Own small software dev business since 2015. Always at the cutting-edge of techs.

team.title: CEO
team.name: Sam Abrika
team.bioHtml: Engineer, contrarian, ex banker, now gamifying personal finance

team.title: Web Developer
team.name: Charlie Mattox
team.bioHtml: A self taught, independent, and passionate developer.

team.title: UX Scientist
team.name: Seo Young (Selena) Kang
team.bioHtml: A student at Cornell University in the College of Engineering. Interested in front-end software.

team.title: Software Engineer
team.name: Albert Leon Wu
team.bioHtml:
Worked at SAP and Rauxa. Experience with Android, Flutter. Went to UC San Diego

C/C++, Python, Javascript, Dart,

jobs.title: Consumer Psychology Content Writer (Internship 4+ months)
jobs.description:
We are creating a new “fintech mobile game” where the goal is to save as much as possible from your real-life income to level-up your in-game avatar, using the AI assistance of Cash Coach.

The whole world tries to make people spend money... the result? $1 trillion of toxic credit card debt. This is about to blow-up as we are entering one of the most brutal financial crisis.

We just launched Cash Coach in the UK to motivate millennials saving money, and need to educate people about their consumption habits, cognitive bias and the reasons driving their spending behaviours.

**Your missions**
* Crunch research papers on behavioural science 
* Write scientific content that is informative and engaging
* Bring insights to the millions of people who want to better understand their psychology

**Your skills**
* You are good analysing data and extracting knowledge from it
* You are a great storyteller
* You can turn complex topics into simple concepts

**Your education**
* You have a strong academic background in cognitive science, psychology or consumer behaviour
* You can read and understand research papers

If you have a passion for consumer psychology and writing that you want to share with the world, then this internship is for you :)

Starting date: as soon as possible.

jobs.title: Economic Content Writer (Internship 4+ months)
jobs.description:
The whole world tries to make people spend money... the result? $1 trillion of toxic credit card debt. This is about to blow-up as we are entering one of the most brutal financial crisis.

We just launched Cash Coach in the UK to motivate millennials saving money, and need to educate people about macroeconomics, finance, accounting, and all the things millennials should know about to be good at managing money.

**Your missions**
* Crunch the numbers from economics studies, research paper and national statistics
* Write data-driven stories that are informative and engaging
* Bring financial education to the millions of people who need it

**Your skills**
* You are good analysing data and extracting knowledge from it
* You are a great storyteller
* You can turn complex topics into simple concepts

**Your education**
* You have a strong academic background in economics or finance or learned it on your own
* You learned statistics: probability theory, distributions.. 
* You can read and understand research papers

If you have a passion for numbers and writing that you want to share with the world, then this internship is for you :)

Starting date: as soon as possible.

jobs.title: Mobile Software Engineer - Internship (4+ months)
jobs.description:
We are offering a 4 to 6 months internship for a highly motivated software engineer trainee.

To be 100% upfront we can't offer much money at this stage. However we can offer you to learn the software engineering skills that even the world best universities won't teach you. We are a team of ex-IBM, pwc, UBS and serial entrepreneurs, and we will massively invest in you.

We don't expect you to have much experience, but we want to invest only in candidates who have oustanding problem solving skills and able to learn very quickly.

In our team, you can expect fun, adrenaline, and the ability to gamify finance for millions of people. 
If coding feels like work or if you are not excited by our mission, this role is not for you.


Your missions
- Learn about the best practices in terms of software testing and architecture
- Implement new game mechanics that will make finance fun to manage
- Find and kill all the bugs you can
- Be an active Cash Coach ambassador


Your skills
- You know the fundamentals of data structure and version control
- You have side projects to showcase your skills (github or other) 
- You are analytical, driven and get stuff done


Your education
- You either are studying Computer Science degree or are self-taught developer
- You learned OOP, statically typed languages (C/C++, Java, ...) and databases (SQL or No SQL)


If you love coding from morning till night, then you will learn how to efficiently build cutting edge products.


Starting date: as soon as possible.

jobs.title: Social Media manager  - Internship (4+ months)
jobs.description:
We are creating a new “fintech mobile game” where the goal is to save as much as possible from your real-life income to level-up your in-game avatar, using the AI assistance of Cash Coach.

The whole world tries to make people spend money... the result? $1 trillion of toxic credit card debt. This is about to blow-up as we are entering one of the most brutal financial crisis.
We just launched Cash Coach in the UK to motivate millennials saving money, and we need to make a lot of noise. 

That’s where you come in, we are looking for evangelists to convert millennials from being “consumers” to being “savers” and help them stay away from toxic debt. 
To make things harder, we have $0 budget to grow. We have to work our way by building a community, creating high-quality content and being creative.
 
This is not your standard corporate marketing internship, we are looking for **evangelists** so if you are not excited by our mission, this role is not for you.

**Your missions**
* Build an online community
* Post content that go viral
* Collaborate with our designer and product team 
* Engage with our early adopters across all social media channels
* Be an active Cash Coach ambassador

**Your skills**
* You know at least one social media channel very well (twitter, IG, youtube…)
* You understand the principles of conversion funnel and A/B testing
* You excel at communication and understanding people
* Your friends find you witty and articulate 
* You are creative and good at posting content people like

If you have a passion for social media and building online communities, then please apply and let us know that you have read the entire internship description in a witty manner :)

Starting date: as soon as possible.
